name: The Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
name_original: The Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
description:
Maddie is looking forward to spending the summer before she begins college working with her best friend, Bridgette, as crew on the luxury cruise ship M.S. Andromache.

So what if its maiden voyage is to retrace the route of its ill-fated sister ship, the S.S. Cassandra, which disappeared inside the perilous Bermuda Triangle almost 100 years before? The media will hype anything for a story and the liner company is only too happy for the extra publicity.

But when things aboard ship start to go awry, Maddie soon realises she’ll have more to deal with than demanding passengers and annoying co-workers. Could she be the key to changing events set in motion almost a century ago, or will the mystery of the Devil’s Triangle claim her too?

_______________________________________________________________

The full game will feature:

  • approximately 70,000 words 
  • Realistic 'serving onboard a cruise ship' action!
  •  8 CGs 
  • 3 romance routes
  • 8 endings

Release date:  16th February 2018

Price: £2.99 (approximately  $4.00)
